name: Alien VR Shooter: Virtual Reality Game For Google Cardboard
name_original: Alien VR Shooter: Virtual Reality Game For Google Cardboard
description:
SALE! -50% OFF!

WARNING: Contains muzzle flashs and other effects which may not be suitable for photosensitive epilepsy.When using application remain stationary and stop using, when you experience discomfort or health reaction.
Ensure you read this document: http://wenklystudio.com/legal/Warnings/VrHealthWarning.pdf before first use.
-------------------
First space alien shooter game in virtual reality.

Feel like in the real NASA space mission trying to find water on mars but discovering that the plant is not inhabbitant. The most ugliest creatures that mankind have ever seen will rapidly detect your presence and there will be no other way than defend yourself with a new technology machingun destroying as much enemies as possible so they will come short when deciding to invade you mother earth.

The game is very addictive.
Thats why the release date was delayed xD.

Experience breathtaking views of being on Mars surface, seeing the earth and other planets of solar system.

Features:
* Stunning graphics and really cool effects and animations.
* Amazing sound effects that will make you feel the space environment.
* Beautiful views on solars system form mars surface
* Optimmized for purpose of virtual reality.


Play on your favorite headset.
